title: Phillippe - Tolstoi back - PSA 4 highest graded FS
author: Marslife

posts.post_title: Phillippe - Tolstoi back - PSA 4 highest graded FS
posts.post_content:
Hey All!  Highest PSA graded Phillippe Tolstoi for sale $3500.  PPFF preferred or check. Shipped or can meet in Strongsville or at the National.  PM with offers and/or additional inquires.  Will consider trades for other T206 Pirates tough backs.  Flecks on the front (sunrise area and over the "E") are cigarette tobacco.

last comp in REA:  1909-1911 T206 White Border Deacon Phillippe PSA VG-EX 4 - Tolstoi Back. Sold For: $3,720 Auction: 2023 January
